about_the_game:
Explore an ancient and mysterious island that drifts amongst the raging clouds of a gas giant. Collect various guns and items, solve puzzles, and shoot any enemies that get in your way, whether they be Skycorps thugs or possessed stone sentinels. Meet the island's inhabitants and aid them in their journey to take down Skycorps whilst they aid you with yours: finding your brother.

DISCOVER - AN INTERACTIVE WORLD

  • Learn abilities to unlock new areas

  • Collect items and money to trade with vendors

  • Discover new mechanics to navigate each area and overcome obstacles

  • Inspect clues and talk to the inhabitants to progress on your journey

  • Solve puzzles to progress and unlock secrets

FIGHT FOR YOUR PEOPLE

  • Find and upgrade unique weapons

  • Choose your own weapon loadout to customize combat

  • Overcome enemies in unique ways

REALIZE YOUR DESTINY

  • Multiple boss battles

  • Semi-linear story-driven gameplay
